introducao: Bem-vindo ao treino de Listening e Compreensão. Vamos revisar as Unidades 19 a 21 com explicações detalhadas.

UNIT19.text: Qual é o melhor filme para assistir com sua família?
The best movie to watch with my family is Inside Out. It's fun and emotional.
I like it because everyone in my family enjoys it, and it teaches important lessons about emotions.
Qual foi a pior música que você ouviu no ano passado?
The worst song I listened to last year was too repetitive and annoying.
It kept playing everywhere, and the lyrics didn’t make much sense.
Aquelas garotas são as melhores dançarinas da competição?
Yes, they are! They dance very well and have great energy.
Their moves are synchronized, and they always smile while performing.
Qual era a pior coisa para fazer na escola?
The worst thing to do at school was cleaning the classroom after lunch.
It was boring and sometimes the food smell was terrible.
Qual é a melhor coisa para comer quando você está cansado?
The best thing to eat when I am tired is pasta or chocolate.
They give me energy and make me feel better instantly.
Qual é a pior coisa para fazer nos finais de semana?
The worst thing to do on weekends is studying all day.
Weekends are for relaxing and spending time with friends or family.
Por que os desenhos eram a melhor coisa para assistir?
Because they were funny and made me happy.
Cartoons helped me learn new words and imagine creative stories.
Qual é o pior lugar para acampar?
The worst place to go camping is a very cold or rainy area.
It’s hard to sleep in a wet tent and keep things dry.
Qual é o melhor: Superman ou Capitão América?
Captain America, because he is brave and kind.
He always fights for justice and helps his friends.
Quem é o melhor vilão da Disney?
Maleficent, because she is powerful and elegant.
Her story shows that villains can have emotions too.

UNIT20.text: Sim, a Katryn é a melhor professora aqui.
Yes, Katryn is the best teacher here.
She explains everything clearly and makes learning fun.
Não, essa não foi a pior música que ele cantou ontem.
No, that was not the worst song he performed yesterday.
Actually, I liked it; it was much better than his last one.
Tirar um cochilo é muito mais relaxante do que comprar online.
Taking a nap is way more relaxing than shopping online.
When I rest, I feel recharged, but shopping only makes me spend money.
Nada é tão entediante quanto pescar.
Nothing is as boring as fishing.
I prefer more active hobbies like hiking or playing sports.
Eu tenho quinze playlists no meu celular agora.
I have fifteen playlists on my phone right now.
Each one is for a different mood or activity.
Minha banda favorita é Coldplay, porque suas músicas são inspiradoras e cheias de emoção.
My favorite band is Coldplay because their songs are inspiring and full of emotion.
Their music always makes me feel hopeful and positive.

UNIT21.text: O diretor ficou bravo com os alunos.
The principal was mad at the students.
They were talking loudly during class, and he lost his patience.
O caminhoneiro era desajeitado e derrubou as caixas.
The truck driver was clumsy and dropped the boxes.
He was in a hurry and didn’t notice the boxes were unstable.
Aquele desenho foi tão bobo, mas eu adorei.
That cartoon was so silly, but I loved it.
It made me laugh a lot, even though it was childish.
Hoje é o melhor clima para um piquenique.
Today is the best weather for a picnic.
It’s sunny but not too hot, just perfect to be outside.
Ela é a pessoa mais legal que eu conheço.
She is the nicest person I know.
She always helps others and never complains.
O Brasil é um dos países mais quentes do mundo.
Brazil is one of the hottest countries in the world.
Especially in the summer, temperatures can be really high.
Minha lembrança mais antiga é da pré-escola.
My oldest memory is from kindergarten.
I remember playing with blocks and learning colors.
O comportamento mais estranho dele aconteceu ontem no almoço.
His strangest behavior happened yesterday at lunch.
He started laughing alone for no reason.
Alguns dos piores profissionais não se importam com a qualidade.
Some of the worst professionals don't care about quality.
They just want to finish fast, even if the result is bad.
Essa é a música mais legal da minha playlist.
That's the coolest song on my playlist!
I always listen to it when I need to feel motivated.
